name: Big Fish Games Application File
summary: Learn about .BFG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BFS files are installed with each downloaded game and are not part of the BFG Game Manager installation. They have the filenames LaunchGame.bfg and UnlockGame.bfg.

description: Application configuration file used by the Big Fish Games (BFG) Game Manager, a program that runs games downloaded from the Big Fish Games online service; saved using XML formatting and contains configuration information used for launching the game.
